Hello Stephen,

I read your article about async/await and it's a great read. I have a question to ask though and I couldn't found an answer to it on multiple blogs.

When we use await keyword with let's say an API call, does that operation happens on Main thread too ? 

a) If yes, how come then the Main thread (UI thread for GUI) continue with remainder of the method ?

b) If No, then it violates the No thread spwan theory of async and await.

Could you please clarify ?
